description: Select columns for the dbo schema from sys.columns
body:
SELECT
	   s.name AS SchemaName
	  ,t.name AS TableName
      ,c.name AS ColumnName
FROM sys.schemas s
	INNER JOIN sys.tables t
		ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
	INNER JOIN sys.columns c
		ON c.object_id = t.object_id
WHERE s.name = 'dbo'
ORDER BY
	  t.name
	 ,c.name
